title: Seed an additional red floral shirt item

requirements.text: Add one additional seeded shirt item with color="Red" and pattern="Floral" to the backend initial dataset in `backend/main.mo` (`_initializeShops`), so that searching with filters itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral returns at least one result and the item has at least one shop in its item details.

quotes: add one more shirt color red patten floral

acceptanceCriteria: With a fresh canister state (empty shops list) and after `_initializeShops()` runs, `searchItems(null, ?"Shirt", ?"Red", ?"Floral")` returns an array with length >= 1.
Calling `getItemDetails(<new item name>)` returns the item plus a non-empty shops array (length >= 1).
The new seeded item has `itemType` set to "Shirt", `color` set to "Red", and `pattern` set to "Floral" (matching should work case-insensitively as implemented by `normalizeText`).
The new seeded item includes a non-empty `photo` string that starts with `/assets/generated/` and matches an actual static asset filename added to the frontend.

requirements.text: Add a new static clothing photo file under `frontend/public/assets/generated` for the newly seeded red floral shirt item, and ensure the seeded backend item’s `photo` field exactly matches the added filename (including extension).

quotes: add one more shirt color red patten floral

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg`.
The new seeded item’s `photo` field is exactly `/assets/generated/men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg`.

Loading the app and running a search for itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral shows the new item in results without a broken image (image loads successfully, or the existing fallback behavior is used if it fails).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo` (no additional canisters/services).
Use English for any user-facing text (no new non-English UI text required for this change).
Do not edit any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new search filters or changing the search UI.
Implementing new authentication or authorization flows.
Adding external image hosting or third-party integrations.

required: Photo of a red floral men’s shirt (men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg)
